io.github.bigbio.pgatk.io.mapcache

Interface IMapStorage<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPropertyStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChronicleMapPropertyStorage, EcachePropertyStorage, InMemoryPropertyStorage, LevelDBPropertyStorage, MapDBPropertyStorage, SparkeyPropertyStorage

    public interface IMapStorage<V>
extends Serializable
    This interface provides general methods to retrieve information from A cache Map implementation such as LevelDBPropertyStorage or ChronicleMap
    Author:
    ypriverol

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanStorage()
      Delete all the information from the Storage
      void close()
      Close a MapStore
      void flush()
      Write all changes to disk.
      V get(String key)
      Retrieve a stored property for a defined item.
      void put(String key, V value)
      Store a particular key and value in the Storage
      long storageSize()
      Get size of the storage

        long storageSize()
        Get size of the storage
        Returns:
        number of elements in the Storage.

    throws PgatkIOException
        Close a MapStore

      • get

        V get(String key)
throws PgatkIOException
        Retrieve a stored property for a defined item. Retruns NULL in case the property has not been set.
        Parameters:
        key - String key
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - In case no item with this id exists.
        PgatkIOException

      • cleanStorage

        void cleanStorage()
           throws PgatkIOException
        Delete all the information from the Storage
        Throws:
        PgatkIOException

      • flush

        void flush()
    throws PgatkIOException
        Write all changes to disk. This function should be called after, for example, a bulk addition is done. Call this function to ensure that consumers will see newly added objects.
        Throws:
        PgatkIOException - In case of any i/o errors.
